title: Colombo Plan and you
creator_credit: National Economic Council and Department of Foreign Affairs
brief_description: Tells something of the work being done by the Colombo Plan and of the assistance being given, by Australia amongst other nations, by means of the donation of machinery and the provision of technical advise. Focuses on the Philippines which is both a donor and a recipient of Colombo Plan and other forms of technical and economic assistance.
